short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A twitch chat extension that alerts user by sound when new message appears in chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plays a short notification sound whenever a new message is sent in twitch chat, similar to other streaming platforms. Ideal for when you don't always have a chat open but still want to catch any new messages.

Features:
- Ability to specify users that you want to be notified about
- Ability to highlight chat messages that include specific text
